trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around June 17th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsInside my car heading NNW on Flatbush Avenue towards Kings Plaza near Avenue V. Approximately 10 a.m. on June 17, 2010. Partly cloudy day. Inside of a cloud mass, a unmoving horizontal approximately 200 foot long ribbon of shimmering gold, silver, purple appeared for 2 seconds then vanished. I noticed it because it was the cloud mass in my line of sight. I immediately thought it was a UFO because nothing shimmers like that then vanishes instantly. I felt calm and delighted that I got to see it, yet disappointed that it vanished so soon. I did laugh because it's as if once I registered it, it vanished.
Summary: Horizontal ribbon of shimmering gold, silver, purple.
